brief_title: Lipo-dox and Cyclophosphamide /5-Fluorouracil in Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
inclusion criteria: 

 histologically proved breast cancer with metastatic disease
brief_summary: To determine the overall objective response rate of pegylated liposomal doxorubicin （Lipo-Dox）combined with cyclophosphamide/5-FU as second-line treatment in patients with metastatic breast cancer.
